rationale: 'highly contagious H5N1 strain' is a technical term, not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
statement_text: Mexico will start vaccinating birds in high-risk areas this week to prevent the spread of the highly contagious H5N1 strain of bird flu in the country, authorities said on Tuesday.

rationale: 'high-risk' describes areas. 'highly contagious' describes the strain. Neither is a Q2 cue.
